title: Lag Whenever I channel an ability
body: Normally, my ping remains at 41 or so, and generally it ranges from 36 to 45, which is fine. But, whenever I play a champion with a channeled ability, for example Sion Q or Varus Q, my ping escalates to anywhere between 200 to 400 ping for about 2 seconds after the ability expires/cast. I have isolated it to only a few champions, pretty much anyone with an ability with a variable timing, and some champions regardless of ability style. I don't know the cause, but it definitely only happens on the cast of a few abilities.

replies.body: Could you try [repairing or forcing a re-patch of your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5)? You might also try updating, reinstalling, or rolling back your video driver. If the error is a connection one, try the steps listed on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know if anything works.

Does the video card thing affect my connection? I remain at at least 250 FPS up to 750 if your are suggesting something that will improve framerate. Forcing a re-patch didn't work, and most of the points on the Connection Troubleshooting guide either don't work or don't really apply, because what I have is a severe case of selective lag instead of regular random lag spikes. Firewalls are set to let League of Champions through, and I am out of ideas apart from just not playing champions with channelled abilities. Which is incredibly annoying. Cheers for the help though, was worth a shot.

> most of the points on the Connection Troubleshooting guide either don't work or don't really apply

My suggestion is to try the other steps even if you don't think it'll work.
